message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Come on, Alice, let's meet in the middle.
Bob, time is money! This is a slight improvement on my last offer, let's close the deal.
Alice, your loss due to inflation is increasing, don't wait!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offers are getting worse with the inflation. Take this offer before it's too late for both of us!
Alice, the inflation is eating away your share. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
